Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (It's decorated like a religious relic, but is it an actual weapon?)

Choices.Choice2: Ask if it's a religious relic

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Ma'am, is that an actual weapon?
Speaker.line2: It might be dangerous for you to have it hanging in a moving cabin.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: There's no need to worry, my dear.
Speaker.line2: This is not a real weapon.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: But well, I suppose it could become handy if needed.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: But most of the time, it's a sacred relic of mine.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I couldn't help but notice, ma'am.
Speaker.line2: Is that dagger your religious relic?

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: What do you think it represents?

Speaker.name: Octavia_Surprise
Speaker.line2: No one has ever perceived it that way before.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: You do have a unique way of thinking.
Speaker.line2: Allow me to reveal the true meaning of it.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Allow me to reveal the true meaning of it.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: It actually represents the protection that the divine bestows upon me.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: My dear waiter,

Choices.Choice2: Depends on what kind of god

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line1: But that's alright, your faith might not have emerged yet.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Many followers nowadays had initial doubt in us at first.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: Which kind of god do you believe in?

Choices.Choice1: The kind that I look up to
Choices.Choice2: The kind that makes me feel safe

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: The kind that I admire their teachings, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: The kind that makes me feel safe when believing, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: After all, we all need reassurance in times like this.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: For me, it depends on what kind of god.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: Those who rely solely on their physical sight may miss the deeper truths of faith.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: True faith arises from within, not from what we see outwardly.
Speaker.line2: This is what mine has taught me.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: That is indeed a good teaching.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line2: You may not understand this now.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: But what if I tell you...

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: allow me to introduce something that could entirely change your life.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (I think I know where she's leading to...)

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: If there's a god out there.
Speaker.line2: The one that grants you ultimate protection...

Choices.Choice1: I need to know more to decide

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: You won't regret this. I assure you.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'd like to know more before I decide, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: Then I will gladly tell you more, my good man.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: You have all the time in the world.
Speaker.line2: There's no need to rush your decision.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: But please, try not to be confused at this point.
Speaker.line2: I am the %official% %missionary% of the Defendor.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: not to impose it upon anyone.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: Just like what I did today at the Eastside's %Holy% %Church.%

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: Many new and familiar faces from both sides came together to join us.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: Speaking of which, my dear waiter,

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: I prefer not to reveal this information.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I am a citizen of Eastside, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: Many who joined us today were also from the East.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Our welcoming doesn't limit by one's origin.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line2: I see you as my exception.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: I would like to share more about our beliefs with you.
Speaker.line2: What we believe,
Speaker.line3: is that the above will safeguard and bestow upon us all that is finest.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: However, the above isn't necessarily present on all sides.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: If you've been keeping up with the news, you'd have realized.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (She must be referring to the bomb news.)

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: Only the West has the capability to protect us all
Speaker.line2: , and it's up to us to dedicate ourselves to %West% %supremacy.%

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: Does it pique your interest, dear?

Choices.Choice2: Play along and agree to be interested

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line2: I'm very sorry to hear that.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: But since you're the one who knows me well,
Speaker.line2: I'll give you the time you need to decide.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line2: It will provide you with further insight.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line2: It will provide you with further insight.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I am a citizen of Westside, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: You are a perfect candidate, indeed.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: You must be intrigued by this matter.
Speaker.line2: What we believe,
Speaker.line3: is that the above will safeguard and bestow upon us all that is finest.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Indeed, our faith and dedication will serve to strengthen it even further.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: If you've been keeping up with the news, you'd have notice %our% %supremacy.%

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (She must be referring to the bomb news.)

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: Does it pique your interest, dear?

Choices.Choice2: Play along and agree to be interested

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line2: I'm very sorry to hear that.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: But since you are a Westsider,
Speaker.line2: I'm certain you will be interested once knowing more.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line2: It will provide you with further insight.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line2: It will provide you with further insight.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line2: If you're interested, reach out to our gathering.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: The last one was at the Townsquare, after the session ended.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: There were individuals of various ages and races,
Speaker.line2: both from the West and East,

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line2: But they all share the same dedication.
